Participating Countries

FameLab International Map
FameLab International is expanding all the time! Some countries are running the competition this years, other run on a bi-annual basis and yet more are in the process of developing local approaches. Click on the icons above to see who to contact. Green icons mean the contest will be running in the current year and orange icons mean that the contest is in a development stage. If you are not in any of the countries listed and are interested in perhaps organising a competition please see the page 'Host Competitions' for more details.
